name: Flhappy Birdsday (Low Effort Jam #14)
description:
Steer your breath around a birthday cake in this innovative, never-seen-before, super low effort game. Put on your headset and breath (loudly) to blow out all the birthday candles and make your wishes come true.

Also features space-bar controls in case your mic does not work.

Playing in a quiet surrounding using a headset is highly recommended.

Browser Support

There might be browser-OS-combinations where the microphone-controls are not working. During development we e.g. encountered problems with Firefox on Windows.

This game does not work in Safari.

License Information

This game was created using the Godot Engine. License information can be found at https://godotengine.org/license.
